explains: adj. 上下文的，与语境相关的

sentences.en: But good science also requires contextual understanding, clear explanation and concise presentation.
sentences.cn: 但是好的科学也需要对上下文的理解，清晰的解释和简洁的表达。

sentences.en: The writer builds up a convincing contextual picture of life during the Civil War.
sentences.cn: 该作者在文脉上勾勒出内战期间令人信服的生活画面。
